svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
June 11, 2022" date: "2022-06-11"
• Ropsten testnet merge a major success : ~99% participation & proposal rates after config fixes & reboots some client pairs proposing
• ~99% participation & proposal rates after config fixes & reboots
• some client pairs proposing empty blocks
• Latest core devs call video . Notes from Tim Beiko : Testnets: Sepolia merge in 3 weeks, Goerli merge in 6 weeks Difficulty bomb to be
• Testnets: Sepolia merge in 3 weeks, Goerli merge in 6 weeks
• Difficulty bomb to be pushed back ~2.5 months
• MEV boost creates a market for building blocks until proposer-builder separation
• Performance benchmarking of consensus layer clients. TLDR: Ethereum has 5 great consensus layer clients: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus,
• TLDR: Ethereum has 5 great consensus layer clients: Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nimbus, Prysm & Teku
• Merge upgrade checklist for solo stakers
• EIP5143 : Slippage protection for Tokenized Vault
• EIP5139 : Remote Procedure Call provider lists
• Aztec shipping delayed due to transaction size difficulties
This newsletter is made possible thanks to Karma !
Karma is building a reputation system for DAO contributors. We aggregate DAO activity (currently over 25 DAO integrations and 25k
contributors !) and work with your community to tailor the score to the needs of your DAO.
Are you worried that your tokenholders are choosing DAO delegates who don’t actively vote and engage in governance? Get in touch with us
to help your tokenholders make informed decisions.
• Remix v0.24.0 : project templates, Solidity compiler config file option, publish code to specified IPFS endpoint
• Ropsten node docker compose template with Erigon-Prysm and Otterscan
• MultiFaucet increased to 100 testnet ETH for Ropsten & Goerli testing
• Etherscan ERC1155 token transfer events endpoint
• web3 scaffold : Foundry, Next.js, RainbowKit, example subgraph
• RainbowKit CLI : scaffold RainbowKit, wagmi & Next.js app
• Ethereum Data Warehouse guide to run queries on NFT mints & trades
• OxPARC zkREPL : zkSNARK web based dev environment
• 20m OP transferred to Wintermute on Optimism but the market maker had not deployed their multisig. Hacker sold 1m OP and returned 18m
OP; 1inch’s Anton Bukov deployed 22k more Gnosis Safes with ownership to Optimism multisig
• Aurora DELEGATECALL vulnerability disclosed, $200 million was at risk, $6 million bounty paid
• OpenSea Wyvern vulnerability disclosed, $3 million bounty paid
• Sense oracle manipulation vulnerability disclosed, $50k bounty paid
• Devcon Bogotá: applications open for builder, student, speaker & volunteer tickets ticket sales in waves from July 18 and raffle+auction
Ethereum aligned supporter program rather than sponsors new Devcon website
• applications open for builder, student, speaker & volunteer tickets
• ticket sales in waves from July 18 and raffle+auction
• Ethereum aligned supporter program rather than sponsors
• Etherscan method filters support EOAs to search for specific types of transactions
• Paypal supports send & receive to ETH wallets for US users
• Hop airdrop claims open on mainnet
• Synthetix V3GM : governance on Optimism using combined mainnet & L2 voting power
• Uniswap research : fee returns on non-rebalancing v3 positions better than v2 by 54% on average
• Forta token (security & operational monitoring), web3 devs, multisig signers & Ethernaut players eligible for airdrop [Disclosure: I’m
• Kate Sills: soulbound tokens should be signed claims
• ApeCoin DAO votes to stay Ethereum by a half a million vote margin
• EF: generalist developer to drive strategic ecosystem initiatives
Job listings: $600 for four issues (~75 character limit), payable in ETH/DAI/USDC to abcoathup.eth on mainnet/Arbitrum/Optimism. Pay with
one click using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
• Jake Chervinsky : US Senator Lummis proposed crypto regulatory framework bill would make CFTC primary spot market regulator rather than
• Lido proposes solving the principal-agent problem by giving stETH holders a veto
• ZachXBT: Players Only NFT rugpull by pro athletes
• Coindesk: US SEC investigating Luna collapse
• Bloomberg: US SEC investigating Binance’s BNB sale
Follow @WeekinEthNews to find out what the most clicked links are. Follow @evan_van_ness and @abcoathup to get most of the week’s news in
• Jun 23 – Gitcoin Grants Round 14 ends (support Week in Eth News )
• Jun 30 – Devcon discounted ticket applications close
• Jul 1 – Data Availability Sampling proposals due
Sign up to receive this newsletter weekly
